creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
Combines journal, habit tracker, mood tracker, and planner in one app, Journal it! is one place to record, track, and plan for all aspect of your life.


Journal it! provides you with a powerful organizing system, advanced tracking tools, secured end to end encryption, easy to use UI, and effortless-realtime-sync.


KEY FEATURES
* Real-time sync across Android, Mac, and Windows
* Organize by journeys (stories), activities, people, tags, places,...
* Mood tracker with detail feelings
* Habit tracker
* Notes, lists, and to-dos
* Comment
* Templates
* Markdowns support
* Dark theme
* End to end encryption
* PDF export
* Highly interactive widgets
* Weekly and monthly statistics
* Offline first, automatically sync when network available
* Export/import journal to your persistent storage
* Minimalistic, beautiful, and personalized UI
* Secure your private diary with fingerprint or password
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal


Keep everything well-organized
* There’re 6 ways to organize your entries, notes,...: journeys, activities, tags, categories, people, places
* Journeys are your stories (eg: a trip, a project,...). They have starts and ends
* Activities are things you do regularly (eg: Movies, Gratitude Journal, Reading, Workout... )


Track as many journaling topics as you want in the same place and still easy to manage. Starting a new entry can't be easier because there's no need to mention the context again for each entry.


Mood tracker
With each entry, attach your mood level (5 total) then add your feelings (🥰happy, 🤣funny, 😀excited,...). You can create your own custom feelings with beautiful emojis.


Habit tracker
Schedule your habits by every day, every number of days, or specific days of week/month,... The app only reminds you of the habits on the scheduled days.


Each habit can have up to 5 slots per day with separated custom reminders


Planner
What you do is also an important part of your memories. To-dos, notes, and lists will help you plan your next events, save information, manage your lists, and keep them recorded.


Get things done without opening the app
You can view to-dos, add items to list, check your habits, edit notes,... right from your home screen using app widgets.


Journal it! is FREE to use even with real-time sync. Subscribe to premium to have:
* Ads free
* Desktop app (Mac and Windows 10 64 bit)
* End to end encryption
* Unlimited custom feelings
* Markdowns support
* Dark mode
* Comment
* Reminders
* Insert photos between texts
* Unlock all home screen widgets
* Access Journal it! VIP community on Facebook where you can get quick support from us and the community


Secure and private
* Text data is stored on our secured real-time database
* Photos are stored on a hidden folder on your Google Drive


We treasure your privacy. Your data stays on the database and your Google Drive only. With end-to-end encryption enabled (disabled by default), you have total control over your data


Contact us:
We’d love to hear feedback from you. Contact us on any channel and we'll get back to you within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress:
* Support email: thanhhai08sk@gmail.com
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/destudiosite/
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to subscribers only

60 days refund:
All purchases are eligible for refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just email us with the order number (GPA) that Play Store emailed you after the charge.
descriptionShort: Bring awareness into your life and live more purposefully

title: Journal it! - Journal & Life Companion

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
Combines journal, habit tracker, mood tracker, and planner in one app, Journal it! is one place to record, track, and plan for all aspect of your life.


Journal it! provides you with a powerful organizing system, advanced tracking tools, secured end to end encryption, easy to use UI, and effortless-realtime-sync.


KEY FEATURES
* Real-time sync across Android, Mac, and Windows
* Organize by journeys (stories), activities, people, tags, places,...
* Mood tracker with detail feelings
* Habit tracker
* Notes, lists, and to-dos
* Comment
* Templates
* Markdowns support
* Dark theme
* End to end encryption
* PDF export
* Highly interactive widgets
* Weekly and monthly statistics
* Offline first, automatically sync when network available
* Export/import journal to your persistent storage
* Minimalistic, beautiful, and personalized UI
* Secure your private diary with fingerprint or password
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal


Keep everything well-organized
* There’re 6 ways to organize your entries, notes,...: journeys, activities, tags, categories, people, places
* Journeys are your stories (eg: a trip, a project,...). They have starts and ends
* Activities are things you do regularly (eg: Movies, Gratitude Journal, Reading, Workout... )


Track as many journaling topics as you want in the same place and still easy to manage. Starting a new entry can't be easier because there's no need to mention the context again for each entry.


Mood tracker
With each entry, attach your mood level (5 total) then add your feelings (🥰happy, 🤣funny, 😀excited,...). You can create your own custom feelings with beautiful emojis.


Habit tracker
Schedule your habits by every day, every number of days, or specific days of week/month,... The app only reminds you of the habits on the scheduled days.


Each habit can have up to 5 slots per day with separated custom reminders


Planner
What you do is also an important part of your memories. To-dos, notes, and lists will help you plan your next events, save information, manage your lists, and keep them recorded.


Get things done without opening the app
You can view to-dos, add items to list, check your habits, edit notes,... right from your home screen using app widgets.


Journal it! is FREE to use even with real-time sync. Subscribe to premium to have:
* Ads free
* Desktop app (Mac and Windows 10 64 bit)
* End to end encryption
* Unlimited custom feelings
* Markdowns support
* Dark mode
* Comment
* Reminders
* Insert photos between texts
* Unlock all home screen widgets
* Access Journal it! VIP community on Facebook where you can get quick support from us and the community


Secure and private
* Text data is stored on our secured real-time database
* Photos are stored on a hidden folder on your Google Drive


We treasure your privacy. Your data stays on the database and your Google Drive only. With end-to-end encryption enabled (disabled by default), you have total control over your data


Contact us:
We’d love to hear feedback from you. Contact us on any channel and we'll get back to you within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress:
* Support email: thanhhai08sk@gmail.com
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/destudiosite/
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to subscribers only

60 days refund:
All purchases are eligible for refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just email us with the order number (GPA) that Play Store emailed you after the charge.

title: Journal it! - Bullet Diary & Life Companion

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
As a life companion, Journal it! intergrates features from many apps like journal, habit tracker, tasks, notes, mood tracker, planner,... so that you can document your life, get insights, set visions, and build your future, all in one place.


KEY FEATURES
* Automatically sync across devices with the same account
* Rich entries with photos between text, comments, location, styled text, templates,...
* Build new habits with habit trackers
* Plan your day with tasks
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Keep your journal well organized with journeys, activities, people, tags, places,...
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Dark theme
* Convenient home screen widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Flashback old memories from notification
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Support end-to-end encryption
* PDF export
* Export/import to and from a zip file
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Other than keeping your precious memories, you can use many other features like tasks, habits, notes, lists, mood tracker, templates, statistics,... to plan your days, set your goals, build new habits, understand your emotions, and more is coming.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separated journals for each subject while still keep things neatly organized.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide automatic, effortless sync experience and being able to use in multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to the developers (with the rist of loosing data if you forgot the passphrase).

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
The app is free to try. Upgrading might not even necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.


CONTACT US
We’d love to hear feedback or questions from you. Please contact us on any channel, we usually get back within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress:
* Support email: hai@doit.me
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.
* User guide: https://guide.journalit.app/

title: Journal it! - Bullet Diary & Journal

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
As a life companion and a true bullet journal alternative, Journal it! is an all-in-one place for all your personal life. You don’t need separate apps for journal, diary, habits, tasks, notes, finance, fitness tracker, mood, or planner,... Effortlessly secure your data forever on the cloud, with an end-to-end encryption option to protect your privacy, and use it on multiple devices simultaneously.


KEY FEATURES
* Automatically sync across devices (Android, iOS, also light versions for Mac and Windows)
* Rich entries with photos between text, comments, location, styled text, templates,...
* Perfect alternative for your paper Bullet Journal (bujo)
* Build new habits with habit trackers
* Plan your day with tasks
* Track everything from your health to financial state with Trackers
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Keep your journal well organized with journeys, activities, people, tags, places,...
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Dark theme
* Convenient home screen widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Flashback old memories from notification
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Support end-to-end encryption
* PDF export
* Export/import to and from a zip file
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Other than keeping your precious memories, you can use many other features like task, habit, note, list, mood, tracker, template, statistics,... to plan your days, set your goals, build new habits, track everything, understand your emotions, and more is coming.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separate journals for each subject while still keep things neatly organized, perfect if you want to digitize your paper Bullet Journal.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and being able to use on multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to the developers (with the risk of losing data if you forgot the passphrase).

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
Journal it! is free for basic use. Upgrading might not even necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.


CONTACT US
We’d love to hear feedback or questions from you. Please contact us on any channel, we usually get back within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress for Journal it! - a true bullet journal alternative.
* Support email: hai@doit.me
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/doitdotme
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.
* User guide: https://guide.journalit.app/

title: Journal it! - Bullet Diary & Journal

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
As a life companion and a true bullet journal alternative, Journal it! is an all-in-one place for all your personal life. You don’t need separate apps for journal, diary, habits, tasks, notes, finance, fitness tracker, mood, or planner,... Effortlessly secure your data forever on the cloud, with an end-to-end encryption option to protect your privacy, and use it on multiple devices simultaneously.


KEY FEATURES
* Automatically sync across devices (Android, iOS, and web version at https://journalit.app)
* Rich entries with photos between text, comments, location, styled text, templates,...
* Perfect alternative for your paper Bullet Journal (bujo)
* Build new habits with habit trackers
* Plan your day with tasks
* Track everything from your health to financial state with Trackers
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Keep your journal well organized with journeys, activities, people, tags, places,...
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Dark theme
* Convenient home screen widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Flashback old memories from notification
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Support end-to-end encryption
* PDF export
* Export/import to and from a zip file
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Other than keeping your precious memories, you can use many other features like task, habit, note, list, mood, tracker, template, statistics,... to plan your days, set your goals, build new habits, track everything, understand your emotions, and more is coming.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separate journals for each subject while still keep things neatly organized, perfect if you want to digitize your paper Bullet Journal.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and being able to use on multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to the developers (with the risk of losing data if you forgot the passphrase).

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).

Journal it! is free for basic use. Upgrading might not even necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.

As a life companion and a true bullet journal alternative, Journal it! is an all-in-one place for all your personal life. You don’t need separate apps for journal, diary, habits, tasks, notes, finance, fitness tracker, mood, or planner,... Effortlessly secure your data forever on the cloud, with an end-to-end encryption option to protect your privacy, and use it on multiple devices simultaneously.


KEY FEATURES
* Automatically sync across devices (Android, iOS, and web version at https://journalit.app)
* Rich entries with photos between text, comments, location, styled text, templates,...
* Perfect alternative for your paper Bullet Journal (bujo)
* Build new habits with habit trackers
* Plan your day with tasks
* Track everything from your health to financial state with Trackers
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Keep your journal well organized with journeys, activities, people, tags, places,...
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Dark theme
* Convenient home screen widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Flashback old memories from notification
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Support end-to-end encryption
* PDF export
* Export/import to and from a zip file
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Other than keeping your precious memories, you can use many other features like task, habit, note, list, mood, tracker, template, statistics,... to plan your days, set your goals, build new habits, track everything, understand your emotions, and more is coming.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separate journals for each subject while still keep things neatly organized, perfect if you want to digitize your paper Bullet Journal.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and being able to use on multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to the developers (with the risk of losing data if you forgot the passphrase).

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
Journal it! is free for basic use. Upgrading might not even necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, no question to answer, no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.


CONTACT US
We’d love to hear feedback or questions from you. Please contact us on any channel, we usually get back within 1 business day. Follow our Instagram for weekly updates on development progress for Journal it! - a true bullet journal alternative.
* Support email: hai@doit.me
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.
* User guide: https://guide.journalit.app/
descriptionShort: A Bullet Journal Alternative. Journal + all in one app for your personal life

title: Journal it! - Bullet & Planner

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
As a life companion, Journal it! integrates features from many apps like journal, diary, habit tracker, tasks, notes, mood tracker, health tracker, planner,... so that you can document your life, get insights, set visions, and build your future, all in one place.


KEY FEATURES
* Works everywhere, start your entry on mobile (Android, iOS) and then finish it on your desktop computer with the web version
* Sync is done automatically, instantly, and effortlessly to keep your journal data safe
* Support end-to-end encryption as the best way to protect privacy
* Rich entries with inline photos/videos, auto tag location, styled text,...
* Plan your days like a bullet journal with tasks and habits
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Keep your journal well organized with journeys, activities, people, tags, places,...
* Track everything from your health to finance with highly customizable trackers
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Quickly access to tasks, notes, habits from your home screen with widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Export to PDF or ZIP
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Other than keeping your precious memories, you can plan your day with tasks and habits, track your goals with journeys, understand your emotions with mood tracker, and the highly customizable tracker feature lets you track everything from health to finance and visualize the result later with charts.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separate journals for each subject while still keeping things neatly organized, perfect if you want to digitize your paper Bullet Journal.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and be able to use on multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to us.

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
The app is free to try. Upgrading might not even be necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, with no question to answer, no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.

* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Com5qjLiDg_rf2iVacrmg
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.

title: Journal it! - Bullet & Planner

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
As a life companion, Journal it! is one app for all your personal life: diary, bullet journal, planner, calendar, time management, time blocking, habit builder, moods, notes, tasks, and everything tracker.


KEY FEATURES
* Sync between multiple devices
* Works everywhere: Android, iOS, web
* Sync is done automatically, and effortlessly to keep your journal data safe
* Support end-to-end encryption to protect the privacy of your journal
* Rich entries with inline photos/videos, auto tag location, styled text,...
* Plan your days like a bullet journal with tasks and events, day themes (work, weekend, holiday,...) and time blocking (morning, work, evening,...)
* Google Calendar integration
* Track how much time you spent on a task with Timer
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Track everything from your health to finance with highly customizable trackers
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Quickly access to tasks, notes, habits from your home screen with widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Export to PDF or ZIP
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Besides keeping your precious memories, you can plan your day with tasks and habits, track your goals with journeys, and understand your emotions with mood tracker, and the highly customizable tracker feature lets you track everything from health to finance and visualize the result later with charts.


THE TIME BLOCKING METHOD
Time blocking (or time boxing, task batching, day theming) allows you to divide your day into blocks of time. Each block is dedicated to accomplishing a specific task, or group of tasks, and only those specific tasks. With this, you won’t have to constantly make choices about what to focus on during your day anymore.

Time management: a pomodoro timer is also included so you can easily track how much time you spent on a particular task.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, and places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separate journals for each subject while still keeping things neatly organized, perfect if you want to digitize your paper Bullet Journal.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and be able to use on multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to us.

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
The app is free to try. Upgrading might not even be necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, with no question to answer, and no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.


Journal it! is one place to document your life, get insights, set visions, and build your future.
CONTACT US
We’d love to hear feedback or questions from you. Please contact us:
* Support email: hai@doit.me
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Journalit
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.

descriptionShort: Bullet journal, time blocking, time management, calendar, and everything tracker

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 8.3.0:
- New Planner UI: week view, month view, quick access to tasks, improved navigation,...
- Redesigned Task: grouped into stages (Idea, To-do, In Progress, Pending, and Finalized), support multiple notes, improved UI
- Calendar Session: 3 levels of priority, automatically mark low and medium priority sessions as done when the date is over
- Edit day structure for multiple days at once

descriptionShort: Bullet journal, time blocking, time management, calendar, and everything tracker
title: Journal it! - Bullet & Planner

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
As a life companion, Journal it! is one app for all your personal life: diary, bullet journal, planner, calendar, time management, time blocking, habit builder, moods, notes, tasks, and everything tracker.


KEY FEATURES
* Sync between multiple devices
* Works everywhere: Android, iOS, web
* Sync is done automatically, and effortlessly to keep your journal data safe
* Support end-to-end encryption to protect the privacy of your journal
* Rich entries with inline photos/videos, auto tag location, styled text,...
* Plan your days like a bullet journal with tasks and events, day themes (work, weekend, holiday,...) and time blocking (morning, work, evening,...)
* Google Calendar integration
* Track how much time you spent on a task with Timer
* Save important information with notes and lists
* Track everything from your health to finance with highly customizable trackers
* Mood tracker with 5 levels of moods and custom feelings
* Quickly access to tasks, notes, habits from your home screen with widgets
* Weekly, monthly, and yearly statistics
* Support offline use, automatically sync when network available
* Lock with fingerprint/face-unlock or password
* Export to PDF or ZIP
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life. Besides keeping your precious memories, you can plan your day with tasks and habits, track your goals with journeys, and understand your emotions with mood tracker, and the highly customizable tracker feature lets you track everything from health to finance and visualize the result later with charts.


THE TIME BLOCKING METHOD
Time blocking (or time boxing, task batching, day theming) allows you to divide your day into blocks of time. Each block is dedicated to accomplishing a specific task, or group of tasks, and only those specific tasks. With this, you won’t have to constantly make choices about what to focus on during your day anymore.

Time management: a pomodoro timer is also included so you can easily track how much time you spent on a particular task.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
The only app with organizing options designed for journaling that help you easily keep everything in context. There’re 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, and places. Each entry can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. No need for separate journals for each subject while still keeping things neatly organized, perfect if you want to digitize your paper Bullet Journal.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit App, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and be able to use on multiple devices, your text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data even to us.

Your photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app (more cloud storage provider options could be added in the future).


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
The app is free to try. Upgrading might not even be necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, with no question to answer, and no form to fill. Just send the receipt to any of our support channels.


Journal it! is one place to document your life, get insights, set visions, and build your future.
CONTACT US

* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Journalit
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 8.6.4:
- Redesigned sync and backend: much faster sync, can handle as much data as decades of usage and much more, improved consistency across devices
- Tasks are no long repeatable but you can schedule repeating calendar sessions that belong to a task
- Fixed UI flickering on Planner tab
- Planner: week view also shows today by default

title: Journal it! - Bullet & Planner

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
Designed to be a life companion, Journal it! is your daily journal, diary, bullet journal, digital planner, calendar, notes, habit tracker, and custom trackers.

Journal it! is available on Android, iPhone, iPad, and the web. Sync between devices is effortless. Keep your data private with lock and end-to-end encryption.


KEY FEATURES
* Sync between multiple devices for free (Android, iPhone, iPad, web)
* Your digital planner: daily planner
* Time block: divide your day into blocks of time to simplify your planner
* Goal planner: track and plan your goals with calendar sessions, tasks, habits, or journeys
* Tasks are organized into stages: Idea, To-do, In Progress, Pending, and Finalized.
* Perfect solution for digital bullet journal or diary
* Google Calendar integration
* Mood tracker: 5 levels of mood, custom feelings
* Track how much time you spent on a task with Timer
* Design your trackers to track everything from health to finance
* Quick access to your planner from widgets
* Support end-to-end encryption to protect the privacy of your digital journal
* Work without internet
* PDF export your journaling data
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* 60-day money-back guarantee
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life while without being overly complicated like Notion. Journal it! is your diary, digital planner, daily planner, tracker (Notion’s database), habit tracker, calendar, journal notebook,... all in one app.


SCHEDULE YOUR DAY WITH TIME BLOCKS
Time blocking (or time boxing, task batching, day theming) allows you to divide your day into blocks of time. Each block is dedicated to accomplishing a specific task, or group of tasks, and only those specific tasks. Time blocks will vastly simplify how you work with your digital planner, daily planner, aesthetic planner…


Connect with your Google Calendars to sync events from both sides.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
Even with everything in one place, Journal it! keep your data well-organized by 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, and places. Each item can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. Perfect for your bullet journal needs.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit Apps, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and be able to use on multiple devices, your journal text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data to hackers or even to us.

Your journal photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app.


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
The app is free to try. Upgrading might not even be necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, with no question to answer, and no form to fill. Just contact us through any of our support channels.


Journal it! (available since 2017) saves your money by removing the need to pay for separate apps for journal, digital planner, daily planner, notes, tasks, Google Calendar, habits builder,...
CONTACT US
We’d love to hear feedback or questions from you about our bullet journal and planner app. Please contact us:
* Support email: hai@doit.me
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/journalitapp/
* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/Journalit
* User guide: https://guide.journalit.app/
* Facebook VIP Group: best support from us and the community, limited to selected users and subscribers.

An all-in-one app for your personal life

Work everywhere

* Goal planner: track and plan your goals with calendar sessions, tasks, habits, or journeys
* Tasks are organized into stages: Idea, To-do, In Progress, Pending, and Finalized.
* Perfect solution for digital bullet journal or diary
* Google Calendar integration
* Mood tracker: 5 levels of mood, custom feelings
* Track how much time you spent on a task with Timer
* Design your trackers to track everything from health to finance
* Quick access to your planner from widgets
* Support end-to-end encryption to protect the privacy of your digital journal
* Work without internet
* PDF export your journaling data
* Support migrating from Journey, Day One Journal
* 60-day money-back guarantee
* No ads


YOUR LIFE COMPANION
Journal it! is designed to be a super app, a hub for all aspects of your personal life while without being overly complicated like Notion. Journal it! is your diary, digital planner, daily planner, tracker (Notion’s database), habit tracker, calendar, journal notebook,... all in one app.


SCHEDULE YOUR DAY WITH TIME BLOCKS
Time blocking (or time boxing, task batching, day theming) allows you to divide your day into blocks of time. Each block is dedicated to accomplishing a specific task, or group of tasks, and only those specific tasks. Time blocks will vastly simplify how you work with your digital planner, daily planner, aesthetic planner…


Connect with your Google Calendars to sync events from both sides.


THE MOST WELL ORGANIZED JOURNAL APP
Even with everything in one place, Journal it! keep your data well-organized by 6 organizing options: journeys (stories, goals,...), activities (routines, interests,...), tags, categories, people, and places. Each item can be organized into multiple organizing options at the same time. Perfect for your bullet journal needs.


PRIVACY AND SECURITY
At Doit Apps, we treasure your privacy, and at the same time keep your experience frictionless. To provide an automatic, effortless sync experience and be able to use on multiple devices, your journal text data is stored securely in the cloud (encrypted on transferring and storing at rest). You can also enable end-to-end encryption to obfuscate your data to hackers or even to us.

Your journal photos are stored in a hidden, private folder on your Google Drive that’s only visible to the app.


MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
The app is free to try. Upgrading might not even be necessary if your usage is simple. All purchases are eligible for a refund within 60 days, with no question to answer, and no form to fill. Just contact us through any of our support channels.


Journal it! (available since 2017) saves your money by removing the need to pay for separate apps for journal, digital planner, daily planner, notes, tasks, Google Calendar, habits builder,...

title: Journal it! - Bullet & Planner

creator: Doit Apps
descriptionHtml:
Introducing Journal it! - Your All-in-One Life Companion for Time Blocking, Bullet journaling, planner, projects manager, note-taking, and much more.


With Journal it!, you can seamlessly integrate all aspects of your life into one powerful app. Say goodbye to scattered notes, forgotten to-dos, and missed deadlines. Our app combines the best features of a journal, daily planner, and task manager, allowing you to effortlessly stay on top of your goals and priorities.


Journal it! works everywhere (Android, iPhone, iPad, and the web), and syncing between devices is effortless. Keep your data private with lock and end-to-end encryption.


KEY FEATURES
📆 Time Blocking: Take control of your schedule with effective time blocking. Plan your day, week, or month and allocate dedicated time slots to your tasks and activities. Maximize your productivity and focus by dedicating uninterrupted time to each task.


📋 Tasks management that makes sense: Unlike other to-do and calendar apps, Journal it! treats Calendar's Slots not as Tasks but as Working Sessions of Tasks. It allows you to connect separate calendar sessions, which can be days, weeks, or even months apart, into one cohesive task. This unique feature makes it easy to work on long-term, complex tasks and seamlessly review your progress once they are completed.


📓 Bullet journaling inspired: Journal it! allows you to seamlessly connect your past, present, and future. Create a cohesive narrative that ties all aspects of your life together. Reflect on your journey, track your progress, and plan for the future with ease.


⏲️ Timeboxing: Break down your projects into manageable sessions with timeboxing. Allocate specific time frames to work on tasks and projects, ensuring progress and productivity.


🗃️ Organization: Keep your journal and planner well-organized with Journal it! Our app offers five ways to organize your life: from different areas of life to projects, activities, tags, and even people. Create a hierarchy between organizers to maintain a clear overview of your journal and planner.


📚 All-In-One Life Companion: Journal it! is your ultimate companion for productivity and organization. From note-taking and habit tracking to project management and more, everything is neatly structured and easily accessible in one comprehensive app.


📊 Insights and Statistics: Gain valuable insights into your habits, progress, and productivity. Journal it! allows you to create custom trackers and provides comprehensive statistics, empowering you to make data-driven decisions for personal growth.


🔒 Secure and Fast: Your privacy is our top priority. Journal it! offers end-to-end encryption, ensuring that your data is safe and secure. Additionally, our app follows a local-first approach, ensuring your data is readily available on your device for improved speed and responsiveness.


60-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
Try Journal it!, bullet journal, and planner risk-free, available on Android, iOS, and web version at journalit.app. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can request a refund within 60 days, no questions asked.
